frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-network-stats
frozen.shortDescription: Displays internet upload speed, download speed, bandwidth, data usage.
frozen.longDescription:
Displays internet upload speed, download speed, bandwidth, data usage. 

 visit github page for instructions, suggestions and feature requests. 

 ERROR while updating extension ? restart your system or reload gnome shell. Alt + F2  then  r + Enter
